div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 06:56 am CDT

div.div: Scattered showers, with thunderstorms also possible after 1pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 64. Breezy, with a light and variable wind becoming north northwest 16 to 21 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.
Partly cloudy, with a low around 43. Breezy, with a north northwest wind 15 to 20 mph decreasing to 8 to 13 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 28 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 67. North northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.
